Overview: Right Click Product Search is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you find the best prices and deals across multiple popular online stores with just a few clicks. Whether you're shopping for electronics, fashion, home goods, or anything else, this extension saves you time and money by making it easy to search your favorite e-commerce sites directly from your browser. Simply highlight or right-click on any text or link, and search the selected term across multiple platforms instantly.

Key Features:
✔ Quick Search Across Multiple Platforms: Search popular online stores like Amazon and eBay, without leaving your current webpage.
✔ Right-Click Context Menu: Use the right-click context menu to search selected text or links, making it fast and intuitive to find the products you want.
✔ Custom Search Options: Add your own custom websites to the search list using flexible URL templates with {query} placeholders. Tailor your search experience to include your preferred niche or local stores.
✔ Country-Specific Search Settings: Customize your searches based on your location. Select your country from a list of options, such as the United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Germany, France, Japan, and more, to ensure you see local prices and availability.
✔ User-Friendly Settings Page: Easily manage which sites to include in your search and adjust custom URLs directly from the extension’s settings page.
✔ Easy-to-Use Interface: The extension's simple and intuitive design makes it accessible to everyone, from casual shoppers to power users looking for the best deals.
✔ Customizable Experience: Choose exactly which websites you want to include in your searches, giving you control over your shopping experience.

How This Extension Helps You:

✔ Find the Best Prices Quickly: Instead of manually visiting each site to compare prices, Right Click Product Search allows you to search multiple e-commerce platforms simultaneously, saving you time and effort.
✔ Save Money on Purchases: By searching multiple stores at once, you can instantly find the best deals and lowest prices available online, helping you save money on every purchase.
✔ Discover New Stores and Products: Use the extension to explore different marketplaces you might not visit regularly, expanding your options and finding unique items or better deals.
✔ Convenient Shopping Tool: Whether you’re at home, at work, or on the go, this extension is your quick-access tool for smarter online shopping, providing a seamless way to compare products and prices without interrupting your browsing experience.
✔ Customize Your Search Experience: Add custom sites to your search list using the {query} placeholder to ensure the extension meets your specific needs. Ideal for users who prefer niche or local stores not already included.
✔ Effortless and Efficient: Right Click Product Search is designed to be simple yet powerful, providing a hassle-free way to get the most out of your online shopping.

How to Use Right Click Product Search:

• Highlight Text or Right-Click on Links: Highlight the product name, model, or any keyword you want to search, then right-click to open the context menu.
• Select a Site to Search: From the context menu, choose which site you want to search. The extension will automatically open a new tab with search results from the selected platform.
• Search All at Once: Use the “Search All of the Above” option to compare prices across multiple platforms simultaneously, giving you a broad view of your options.
• Customize Your Settings: Visit the settings page to adjust your search preferences. Add or remove sites, configure custom URLs, and select your country to tailor the extension to your needs.

Supported Websites:

• Amazon: The world's largest online marketplace, perfect for finding a wide range of products.
• eBay: Ideal for auctions, second-hand items, and unique finds from independent sellers.
• Walmart: A go-to store for everyday essentials, electronics, and more.
• Best Buy: A leading electronics retailer with a wide selection of tech products, appliances, and accessories.
• Target: Known for its stylish yet affordable products, Target is great for home goods, clothing, and more.
• Etsy: Perfect for discovering handmade, vintage, and unique items from independent sellers.
• AliExpress: A global marketplace offering a vast range of products at competitive prices, often directly from manufacturers.
• Is your preferred retailer not on the list? Add up to two custom sites to your search list.

Settings and Customization:

• Country Selection: Choose from a list of countries to ensure your search results are relevant to your location, including the United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Germany, France, Japan, India, Italy, Spain, Australia, Brazil, Mexico, Netherlands, United Arab Emirates, and Singapore.
• Website Selection: Select which websites to include in your searches. You can toggle on/off any of the supported platforms to customize your shopping experience.
• Custom Search URLs: Add custom websites with search URL templates using {query}. For example, if you have a specific website where you often shop, you can add it to your list and search it just like any other platform.
• Easy Access to Settings: Access the settings page directly from the extension’s popup or the browser menu to manage your preferences effortlessly.

Commission Disclosure: The developer of Right Click Product Search may receive a small commission if you make a purchase through some of the search results generated by this extension. This commission comes at no extra cost to you and helps support the continuous improvement and maintenance of the extension. Your support allows us to keep providing useful tools like this one while enhancing the shopping experience for all users.

Why Choose Right Click Product Search?

✓ Save Time: Instantly search multiple stores without having to open new tabs or type in URLs.
✓ Save Money: Compare prices across platforms to ensure you’re getting the best deal possible.
✓ Customize Your Search: Tailor the extension to meet your specific needs with easy-to-use customization options.
✓ Support Independent Developers: Your use of this extension helps support ongoing development and keeps it free for everyone.

Get Started Today: Download the Right Click Product Search extension and start saving time and money on your online shopping. Compare prices, find the best deals, and make informed purchasing decisions all in one place. With its simple interface and powerful features, this extension is the perfect companion for any savvy shopper looking to make the most of their online buying experience.
